title: 98/507/EC: Commission Decision of 28 July 1998 amending Decision 97/408/EC on protective measures in relation to classical swine fever in the Czech Republic (notified under document number C(1998) 2276) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 July 1998 amending Decision 97/408/EC on protective measures in relation to classical swine fever in the Czech Republic (notified under document number C(1998) 2276) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/507/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. Article 1 of Commission Decision 97/408/EC is replaced by the following article:
'Article 1
The Member States shall prohibit the importation of live pigs, semen, embryos and ova of the porcine species from the districts of the Czech Republic described in the Annex to this Decision.`
2. The Annex to Commission Decision 97/408/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
The Member States shall amend the measures they apply in respect of the Czech Republic to bring them into line with this Decision. They shall inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
